fn.p: W.T., C.M.-M., S.S. and E.V. conceived and designed the study; M.S., D.H. and S.S. produced the paleoecological data supervised by J.F.N.v.L. and E.V.; C.M.-M. and M.S. analyzed the data; C.M.-M. and W.T. led the writing of the manuscript with contributions of the rest of co-authors; all authors approved the final version of the manuscript.
